title: Medusa

fields.name: *Win Con:
fields.value: * You win when all but 2 players are Petrified, and at least 1 player is Petrified.

desc:
Post 26
***Stonegaze** (Charge 100%, Starting charge 50%)*
Choose a player. If you could kill them, they will  be roleblocked and become Petrified.
***Gorgon's Rage***
Choose a Petrified player to attack.
***Petrified** (Passive)*
You will astrally roleblock every Petrified player every night. Additionally, if they die, their role will be erased. This ability cannot be roleblocked.
***At a Glance** (Locked, Passive)*
Unlocked if you place in the top 3. Triggered when you score above 50%. Whenever a player attacks you, you will use Stonegaze on them instead of doing your chosen ability.
